mapper.insert: insert into bsh_wish_rest (wr_seq, rest_seq, wr_date, mb_id) select bsh_wish_rest_seq.nextval, #{rest_seq}, sysdate, #{mb_id} from dual where not exists ( select rest_seq, mb_id from bsh_wish_rest where rest_seq=#{rest_seq} and mb_id=#{mb_id} )
mapper.select: SELECT r1.wr_seq, r1.rest_seq, r1.wr_date, r1.mb_id, r2.mb_id, r3.rest_seq, r3.rest_name, r3.rest_link FROM bsh_wish_rest r1 INNER JOIN bsh_member r2 ON r1.mb_id = r2.mb_id INNER JOIN BSH_RESTAURANT r3 ON r1.rest_seq = r3.rest_seq where r1.mb_id=#{mb_id}
